name: Balaji Websoft Technology Pvt. Ltd.
description:
Baltech India is a privately owned company offering offshore outsourcing services to various clients in North America, Europe and Australia since year 2008. Our services and solutions are designed with a focus on secure, scalable, expandable and reliable business systems. Through our low cost, high quality and reliable software services, we serve our clients giving them value for money and thus client satisfaction.
We are committed towards achieving high levels of customer satisfaction by ensuring quality, cost effective and timely solutions. It would be our endeavor to achieve this with technical, financial, business and moral excellence. 
Serving a wide range of global clients, we are a team of digital specialists, ranging from designers to developers, project managers, quality analysts and SEO consultants all passionate about our work. We specialize in multi platforms and technologies like open source platforms, PHP frameworks, native and hybrid mobile solutions.
Baltech provides wide array of services when it comes to the digital world. It’s been our forte for the better part of 11 years. We well understand the needs of our clients and further customers of theirs, thereby facilitating in the very best of digital services.
